meanings.definition: A group of stars that form a recognizable pattern.
meanings.sent1: At night, I looked up and saw an asterism that looked like a smiley face.
meanings.sent2: The Big Dipper is a famous asterism in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The asterism of stars seemed to be winking at me playfully.
meanings.sent4: The asterism of stars shone brightly, guiding us through the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the beautiful asterism of stars above them.

meanings.definition: A typographical symbol consisting of three asterisks placed in a triangle.
meanings.sent1: In the document, the asterism was used to indicate a special section.
meanings.sent2: The asterism symbol was used to separate different paragraphs.
meanings.sent3: The writer added an asterism to make the text more interesting.
meanings.sent4: The asterism on the page caught the reader's attention immediately.
meanings.sent5: The asterism symbol stood out on the page, drawing the reader's eye.
